summary:
Enter The Metaverse - The NETVRK token can be used to buy assets within the virtual reality world you are in. Assets can include buildings, vehicles, houses along with many other items that can be found in the NETVRK marketplace.

 Token Ecosystem - The $NETVR token can be used to buy assets within the virtual reality world you are in.

 Token Listings - Netvrk Token

 NFT Collection - Stylize Your Virtual Presence

 LAND - Virtual Land allows users in the Netvrk Metaverse to deploy assets, monetize land, as well as receive Netvrk Reserve distributions.

 AD SPACE - on-sell ad space, generate recurring income

 NFTs - create virtual asset, purchase NFTs, sell NFTs

 C2C - facilitate services, custom monetization

 Social media - Join our Community of Over 500k!

 Inside the Metaverse - Netvrk is where users play a decisive role in the future of the metaverse.

 Studio - In Production at Netvrk

 Core Values - We stand for transparency, integrity, & respectful communication.

 Vision - Our vision is to become the next evolution of the internet by offering the world a way to consume and create immersive experiences while monetizing and sharing content.

 Mission - Our mission is to generate a unique and visually attractive world, ready to be explored, populated and even reshaped to match all users' needs.

 Our Collaborators - Are Diversely Skilled Developers & Artists
